titles.title: To repeal the Act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of North Dakota over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Devils Lake Indian Reservation".
To repeal the Act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of North Dakota over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Devils Lake Indian Reservation".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

committee.subcommittee: Indigenous Peoples of the United States
committee.name: House Natural Resources
